Row.Text: Adopt the Peacemaker as Your Forces' Official Sidearm

The Peacemaker, otherwise known as the Single Action Army. You are completely convinced that it is the best handgun ever produced -- a standpoint difficult to argue against when they see your skills with it. Enforce "The Gesture" as Your Forces' Salute

Your distinctive hand gesture has drawn both admiration and ridicule. Still, everyone in your army knows it well, and even the people of other Civilizations can recognize it. If you were to make it your army's salute, it may end up hurting discipline a bit, but it may do something to help your company's image -- if that's something which matters to you.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Outer Heaven [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have completed the Honor Tree [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence decay rate for City-States is reduced by 20%, and [ICON_GOLD] Gold gifts produce 20% more Influence.
